text: A yAt Tezmamt! Ur sfuhruyet ddin nnwen. Ur qqaret, $ef Oebbi, siwa tidep. Lmasie Aisa, mmi s n Meryem, d amazan kan n Oebbi; d awal iS i Irra ar Meryem, u d ooue s $uoeS. Ihi, amnet s Oebbi akked imazanen iS, ur qqaoet: "krav"! Eebset, ppif i kunwi. Oebbi d Yiwen kan n Oebbi. Gedha s yiS, ma ad Isau mmi S! IneS i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Nesteqnaa s Oebbi d Awkil
